remarks: Distributive law for scalar product (right-distributivity). ( ~ lmodvsdir analog.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
clmvsdir.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
clmvsdir.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
clmvsdir.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
clmvsdir.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
clmvsdir.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
clmvsdir $p |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ ( Q e. K /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( Q + R ) .x. X ) = ( ( Q .x. X ) .+ ( R .x. X ) ) ) $.
